-children.#comment: "The Flower Review (TPREV)", a simple MU scene using DIS Sensor Event Distribution, It is assumed the reviewers (users) have a non-X3D voice channel (e.g. TeamSpeak) open for their "discussion about the teapot"
basic nodes, which might be present in any scene
LayerSet with two layers, navigation happens in layer 1
the first Layer contains the main scenery - "The Review of the Flower (DIS Multiuser)"
the second layer contains the sliders that are moved with the user's display like a HUD (heads up display)
this group contains the red/green/blue 3D crosshair
Arrow X
Arrow Y
Arrow Z
the model that is being reviewed by the users of this scene
<Inline DEF="Flower" url='"bumpyfreewrl.x3d"' />
Images courtesy of Paul Debevec's Light Probe Image Gallery
<Sphere radius='40'></Sphere>
TO CONVERT TO A SPHERE <ShaderPart url='"../shaders/freewrl.vs"'></ShaderPart> <ShaderPart url='"../shaders/freewrl_bubbles.fs"' type='FRAGMENT'></ShaderPart>

#sourceCode: var rho = a + b * Math.cos(c * theta + tdelta) * Math.cos(d * phi + pdelta);
